channel.title: Hacking program
channel.description:
Hey guys i discoverd a new program that targets and records your sendings and reciving. I use it with club penguin alot to get some cash. You can change the codes and send it into the game it will give it to you. Anyways for Runescape! I havent tried yet you could turn the item into a super rare wich would be awsome!. It's called WPE i don't know what it means but you can search it up on the internet. For world of warcraft privite servers it will only work under patch 1.12.
The program is called : WPE search for it in google you'll find it everywhere Some computers Dietect it's a torjan but its not torjan, so you'll need to disable your comp's spyware.

item.title: Hacking program
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Didn’t you hear, frank_? Jagex are employing Intelligent Detection of In-Game Obfuscation Tables (IDIOT) now. They don’t have to send packets when we drop money, the server just guesses. It’s pretty secure though, the server is a really really good guesser. It’s a shame they wont release the source, I was thinking of using it for my Lotto numbers.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking program
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“avistetto”]ITS CALLEd a FUCKEN PACKET EDITOR i hacked cp like 6months ago you can also hack items with it and no you cant hack runescape or secure online games because they dont send packets when you like drop money and if u want to hack cp google club penguin trainer some guy made a program that hs a temp membership hack and everything else …[/quote]is that one big sentence?

wtf are you talking about… not sending packets?

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking program
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

RLN:

It could be used to “make free geepees”, depending on if jagex fucked up in their server. Look at the dupe in rsc, that was just a little bug that turned into something big. Anything is possible, you pretty much just have to “guess” where to look, or stumble upon something you can exploit. The problem would probably be with encryptions, you would need to decrypt them yourself then encrypt them before they “leave your computer” or leave them unencryped when they leave the client, and encrypt them after you process/fuck with them.

Another option is to abuse interface bugs with a client that is only slightly modified. You could find these by methodically searching and editing the interface methods in the client. There are thousands of bugs in Runescape, most of them impossible to abuse in a useful way, but the majority of them undiscovered.

Read full topic

Anything is possible, you pretty much just have to “guess” where to look, or stumble upon something you can exploit. The problem would probably be with encryptions, you would need to decrypt them yourself then encrypt them before they “leave your computer” or leave them unencryped when they leave the client, and encrypt them after you process/fuck with them.

item.title: Hacking program
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:4, topic:54129”]Obviously you know absolutely nothing about how RS works. Let me summarize it for you:

[]

^ that square is the server. That’s where all the information is stored.

"

that quote mark is your computer. This is where you waste your life.

" -----1010101101---> []

that’s WPE sending fake packets to the server.

      Your account has been disabled.
Please see your message centre for details.

That’s what you see.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking program
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Ignore all the spam above.

Thanks for the recommendation, but we, as a community, know of this already. It can be really good for loads of games, apart from RuneScape, unless you want to make fakes. Don’t let anyone make you believe that this can be used to make ‘phr33 geepees’

Read full topic
